title: Old school font?!?
content:
Hey just trying to find out the name of the orange font included in the attached pic. It looks pretty retro, I have been told it looks like an Emigre font.

Thanks heaps

Elliot

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130805214730/http:/typophile.com/files/font_148.jpg) | 33.94 KB |
author: Midiman

comments.content:
Doesn’t look Emigre at all. It’s called a script font, btw.  
It’s [Coffee Service](http://web.archive.org/web/20130805214730/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/sideshow/coffee-service/), although I was expecting it to be something more familiar.
